3.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan and the Sunnah Regarding It

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that:The Messenger of Allah said: "Whoever calls the Adhan for twelve years, he will be guaranteed Paradise, and for each day sixty Hasanat (good deeds) will be recorded for him by virtue of his Adhan, and thirty Hasanat by virtue of his Iqamah

chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of The Adhan And The Reward Of The Mu'adh-dhin
